name: ARAIG  -  As Real As It Gets
blurb: A multi-sensory feedback suit to experience the next level of gaming. Finally you get to feel what you\u2019ve only been able to see.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Civilian: Access to ARAIG forums where you can discuss ARAIG, offer suggestions, and interact with the development team.
Recon: Reserve your online user name (first come first serve). Includes $5 pledge.
Technician: Get to vote on product look and design as it goes through the development process and vote on the stretch goals. Includes $10 and $5 pledge.

Scientist: Your name is placed on a plaque at our headquarters and on our website as a Founder Contributor. Have a Founder's Emblem placed by your user name whenever you post on the Forum to signify you as a Founder Contributor. You help determine the look and design of the Founder's Emblem and you get to vote on what the final Founder's Emblem will be. Includes $25, $10, and $5 pledge.
Legion One Novitiate: Get access to purchase all ARAIG products 2 weeks earlier than the general public. Includes $35, $25, $10 and $5 pledge.

Legion One Honour Guard: Get an ARAIG with the Founder's Emblem and the Legion One logo engraved onto your ARAIG. You are involved in the Legion One logo creation process and get to vote for the final design. Includes $50, $35, $25, $10 and $5 pledge. Shipping and handling not included.

Legion One Honour Guard: Get an ARAIG with the Founder's Emblem and the Legion One logo engraved onto your ARAIG. You are involved in the Legion One logo creation process and get to vote for the final design. Includes $50, $35, $25, $10 and $5 pledge. Shipping and handling not included.

Legion One Honour Guard: Get an ARAIG with the Founder's Emblem and the Legion One logo engraved onto your ARAIG. You are involved in the Legion One logo creation process and get to vote for the final design. Includes $50, $35, $25, $10 and $5 pledge. Shipping and handling not included.

Legion One Honour Guard: Get an ARAIG with the Founder's Emblem and the Legion One logo engraved onto your ARAIG. You are involved in the Legion One logo creation process and get to vote for the final design. Includes $50, $35, $25, $10 and $5 pledge. Shipping and handling not included.

Legion One Honour Guard: Get an ARAIG with the Founder's Emblem and the Legion One logo engraved onto your ARAIG. You are involved in the Legion One logo creation process and get to vote for the final design. Includes $50, $35, $25, $10 and $5 pledge. Shipping and handling not included.

Legion One Honour Guard: Get an ARAIG with the Founder's Emblem and the Legion One logo engraved onto your ARAIG. You are involved in the Legion One logo creation process and get to vote for the final design. Includes $50, $35, $25, $10 and $5 pledge. Shipping and handling not included.

Legion One Spectre: You and a friend are invited to our exclusive launch party in Toronto. Includes an ARAIG with the Founder's Emblem and the Legion One logo engraved onto your ARAIG, access to vote on the Kickstarter Limited Edition Sim Skin, $50, $35, $25, $10,  and $5 pledge. You will receive your ARAIG at the Launch Party and if your accompanying friend buys an ARAIG they will get theirs at the Launch Party too!

Legion One Spectre: A pledge where you get to tell us what you want! Just private message us for your ideas and we will confirm with you whether it is possible or not. Estimated delivery may be earlier than listed depending on what you ask for.

Legion One Spectre: You and a friend are invited to our exclusive launch party in Toronto. Includes an ARAIG with the Founder's Emblem and the Legion One logo engraved onto your ARAIG, access to vote on the Kickstarter Limited Edition Sim Skin, $50, $35, $25, $10,  and $5 pledge. You will receive your ARAIG at the Launch Party and if your accompanying friend buys an ARAIG they will get theirs at the Launch Party too!

Legion One Architect: Be part of the Alpha Test Team. You get to try the first ARAIG prototypes and KEEP YOUR ALPHA PROTOTYPE! Spend 3 days with the team, use ARAIG and help with the next stages of the development process. Cost for flight is not included. Cost for hotel is included. You also receive a Kickstarter Limited Edition Sim Skin with the Founder's Emblem and the Legion One logo engraved on your Sim Skin. You also get everything a Legion One Spectre receives.

Legion One Architect: Be part of the Closed Beta Test Team. You get to try ARAIG during its final stage of development and KEEP YOUR BETA PROTOTYPE! Spend 3 days with the team, use ARAIG and help finalize ARAIG. Cost for flight is not included. Cost for hotel is included. You also receive a Kickstarter Limited Edition Sim Skin with the Founder's Emblem and the Legion One logo engraved on your Sim Skin. You also get everything a Legion One Spectre receives.

Legion One Architect: Be part of the Alpha Test Team and the Closed Beta Test Team. Help from the beginning prototype to the final design and you get to KEEP YOUR ALPHA AND BETA PROTOTYPES! Spend 6 days with the team, 3 days for Alpha and 3 days for Beta, use ARAIG in both initial and final stages and help us from beginning to the end. Cost for flight is not included. Cost for hotel is included. You also receive a Kickstarter Limited Edition Sim Skin with the Founder's Emblem and the Legion One logo engraved on your Sim Skin. You also get everything a Legion One Spectre receives.
